meanings.definition: Ancient alphabets used by Germanic peoples.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered ancient runes on the stone tablet.
meanings.sent2: The runes on the artifact were difficult to decipher.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to write secret messages using pretend runes.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace had mysterious runes etched into the silver pendant.
meanings.sent5: The runes carved into the tree trunk told a story of ancient times.

meanings.definition: Symbols or characters with magical significance.
meanings.sent1: The wizard's cloak was adorned with mystical runes.
meanings.sent2: The runes inscribed on the amulet glowed softly in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller gazed at the runes and predicted a bright future.
meanings.sent4: The runes on the old book seemed to shimmer with hidden power.
meanings.sent5: She felt a surge of energy as she traced the runes with her finger.

meanings.definition: To cast or inscribe with runes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully runes the spell onto the parchment.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith runes the sword with ancient symbols.
meanings.sent3: He playfully runes his name on the sandy beach.
meanings.sent4: The artist runes intricate patterns on the pottery.
meanings.sent5: The shaman runes protective symbols around the village.
